title: What informed consent should include
summary: Risks, alternatives, and realistic outcomes should be clearly explained.
body: You should understand benefits, risks, and what to do if something feels off. Questions are welcome, not rushed.

title: Medical red flags
summary: Rushed consults and unclear credentials are common warning signs.
body: You should feel safe, listened to, and never pressured. If you do not, it is okay to pause.

title: When to walk away
summary: Trust your instincts when something feels rushed or dismissive.
body: A good provider explains options, listens, and respects your boundaries. If not, you can leave.
